name: Powerglove Reloaded
description:
Powerglove Reloaded is an Amiga remake of the 2014 C64 title Powerglove. Later PC versions were made available as well.

In an age where fossil fuels have been exhausted, Earth's power needs are supplied by thermal reactors under both the north and south poles. Unfortunately, an explosion has knocked out the north pole reactor, and without the power supplied from the reactor, billions are at risk of dying. You are sent in to engage the reactor's backup systems and restore the power supply. Protect yourself against the out of control maintenance robots within the reactor facility and use the control diamonds to enable the backups.

shot.caption: Title screen introducing the game's baddies which are cute robots.
Power Glove Reloaded supports dual buttons - unique for for a game running on an Amiga.
The robots, named 'Face', 'Squiddy' and 'Face', will fire as soon as you are in their scanner range.
A hidden room with a much-needed power-up. The path is blocked by debris that can be removed by a charged shot.
Each level ends with a boss-fight. Make sure your health bar is maximum equipped.
Having defeated the first boss, collect the red key to access any of the five remaining levels.
Entering a security gate disarms your weapon.
In later levels corridors are more dense and platforms more difficult to reach.

Running the game in CLASSIC mode is more or less identical to the C64 version. (including graphics) There are five (slightly different) levels, but less versatile rooms, no powerups and no bossfights.
